Intro¶

This assignment was to create a two applications that would run a reception and master library IoT pair, as well as the admin website to add and remove books.

Getting Started¶

To get started you must have installed or satisfy the various dependencies:

-mysqlclient-1.4.2-cp37-cp37m-win32.whl -flask (e.g. pip3 install flask) -flask WTForms (pip3 install Flask-WTF) -sqlalchemy & marshmallow (pip3 install flask flask_sqlalchemy flask_marshmallow marshmallow-sqlalchemy) -oauth2client (pip3 install google-api-python-client oauth2client) -httplib2 (pip3 install httplib2)

Must have the following items:

-2 Raspberry Pi devices with working wifi connections and IP addresses.
